1115473462988906496.text:
$DAI is becoming the de facto currency of DeFi 

- @UMAprotocol's using it for margin on synthetic tokens. 
- @Dharma_HQ and @compoundfinance are lending and borrowing it out.
- @AugurProject's using it for prediction markets.

Any other examples?https://twitter.com/SpencerApples/status/1115426455628988418 …

1112773758861918210.text:
This is the first synthetic issuance of many for @UMAprotocol.

The protocol sets the rails for creating derivative exposure to any underlying asset(s) one can think of, with aligned incentives for all. 

May become one of $DAI ‘s biggest sinks, for those watching @MakerDAO.

1111501124983373824.text:
Much of what cryptocurrency enables comes down to access. Being able to access markets you couldn't otherwise. Being able to access products you otherwise wouldn't have the means to purchase.

1/

1111085702102450176.text: Any Internet-connected individual in the world can now hold exposure to the US Stock Market. It’s not often that products are released in crypto that *actually* enable something previously impossible.  Congrats @hal2001 @allilulllc https://twitter.com/UMAprotocol/status/1110910980769275904 …
